alert.note: Alert for Alleghany; Bath; Craig; Rockbridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 2:30PM EST until January 09 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 11 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze, less than a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Virginia and southeast West Virginia. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 11 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will change to all rain by mid to late morning as temperatures warm above freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please report ice accumulations via email at rnk.skywarn@noaa.gov or by calling the National Weather Service toll free at...1...866...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Leave a message with your observation and the specific location where it occurred. You can also post your report to National Weather Service Blacksburg Facebook page and on Twitter. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
